channel.title: How do I add the time to the top of my server?
channel.description:
Hi,
I would like to add the time to my server, how do I do this?
Thanks.
Musicmad

item.title: How do I add the time to the top of my server?
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

Do something like the following.
java.util.Calendar cal = new java.util.Calendar();
public String time() {
SimpleDateFormat timestamp = new SimpleDateFormat(“HH:mm:ss”);
cal.setTimeInMillis(System.currentTimeMillis());
return “[” + timestamp.format(cal.getTime()) + "] ";
}
Which will return; HOUR:MINUTE:SECOND

Read full topic
item.source: How do I add the time to the top of my server?
